question: Ministry of education is classified into how many departments?
explanation:
Ministry of Education, erstwhile Ministry of HRD was established on 26 September 1985 after passing the 174th Amendment. Ministry of Education is broadly divided into the following two categories:
  1. Department of School Education & Literacy: The objective of this department is to provide education for all right from childhood and increase the literacy rate of the country through various schemes.
  2. Department of Higher Education: This department focuses on providing superior higher education and research opportunities in the country.
